00016 // class pipe_conv
00017 //
00018 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00019 #ifndef AGG_PIPE_CONV_INCLUDED
00020 #define AGG_PIPE_CONV_INCLUDED
00021 
00022 #include "agg_basics.h"
00023 
00024 namespace agg
00025 {
00026 
00027     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00028     // An abstract base class for all pipe converters. Any pipeline can be 
00029     // constructed statically using conv_something template classes only, which 
00030     // is good, bacause there're no virtual calls and thus all of it works faster. 
00031     // But since all these classes are templates, we have two problems:
00032     //
00033     // 1. Every next declaration of templatized pipline will contain all 
00034     //    previous declarations, so if we need really long pipeline (say, of 10 
00035     //    steps), we will have really long declarations which are extremally
00036     //    hard to read and change. And although compilers are mature enough
00037     //    nowadays, their tolerance is still finite :-)
00038     //
00039     // 2. We cannot construct different pipelines dynamically, since there're
00040     //    no common base class with virtual functions.
00041     //    
00042     // A set of classes pipe_conv_something is designed to overcome this evil for
00043     // the price of one extra virtual call per vertex at each pipeline step. 
00044     // So, every pipe_conv_something class should be derived from this one and
00045     // should have a constructor that accepts a pointer to a predecessor pipe_conv
00046     // (vertex source). See any pipe_conv_somrthing class for details.
00047     //------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     class pipe_conv
00049     {
00050     public:
00051         virtual ~pipe_conv();
00052 
00053         virtual void reset_iterator(unsigned start) = 0;
00054         virtual pathflag_e next_vertex(double* x, double* y) = 0;
00055     };
00056 
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 #endif
00061
